aboutDescription: Fullstack Engineer passionate about creating modern web experiences
whoIAmText1: I'm DzCoder, a fullstack engineer with expertise in modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. My passion lies in creating user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems.
whoIAmText2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing my knowledge through blog posts and tutorials.
letsWorkTogetherText: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat about technology, feel free to reach out!
